# Heatmap

```{r}
library(ggalign)
```


```{r}
set.seed(123)
# Prepare heatmap matrix
mat <- matrix(
    rnorm(200, mean = 5, sd = 2),
    nrow = 20, ncol = 10,
    dimnames = list(paste0("G", 1:20), paste0("S", 1:10))
)
```

```{r}
#| class-output: preview-image
ggheatmap(mat)
```

```{r}
ggheatmap(mat) + scale_color_viridis_c()
```
